overview:
Joe founded NextMark in 1999 with the mission of helping organizations reach their market through addressable media. Prior to NextMark, Joe built some of the world’s biggest marketing databases while with Exchange Applications and two mobile computing platforms while with Travelers.

Joe holds 3 US patents, has been awarded the DMEF Rising Stars Award, and is among BtoB Magazine’s Who’s Who List. Joe holds a Masters Degree in Computer Science from Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute and dual Bachelor of Arts Degrees in Mathematics and in Computer Science from Cornell University.
